    EditProfileActivity US 02.02.01 (2) As an owner or borrower, I want to edit the contact information in my profile.
    GalleryAdapter
    GalleryAdapter This is just a normal adapter, but for GalleryActivity (and associated recyclerView)
    ListOfRequestsActivity
    This class deals with accepting requests that other users have made for one of our books The book object in question is passed in through the intent.putExtra, and current user is in Shared Preferences Everything else is accessed via queries to firebase
    LORRecyclerViewAdapter
    This is the adapter for the List of requests for the recycler view
    LORRecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder
    This viewholder is for each individual entry in our recycler view Must contain all the appropriate view items
    MainActivity
    MainActivity This activity directs to the sign in activity when called holds the navigations that goes to the different fragments Holds the app bar which directs to different functionalities
    MyAdapter
    THis is the adapter for the myBooks fragmesnt TODO get actual images instead of the 3 temp ones
    MyAdapter.ViewHolder 
    Notification
    display notifications
    NotificationAdapter
    //adapter for the notification recycler view //works like all the other adapters in the project.
    Rating
    THis is the Wow factor rating object, which deals with the star rating of an User or Book object.
    Request
    A request object represents one user requesting to borrow a book from its owner A request will always be stored under the owners User object, so we only need to store the requesters username Status is used to represent whether a request has been accepted, declined, or if no action has been taken yet Since these objects are not directly stored in firebase, they don't need a unique id
    RequestAdapter
    adapter for the RequestFragment recycler view
    User
    deleted "state" and rearranged some code, need to get ratings working - Evan
    ViewProfileActivity
    ViewProfileActivity Send in either: key: "Username" - a Username in the form of a String key: "User" - a User object This Activity shows the profile/user information of any user.
